survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Ride-Sharing Apps
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of ride-sharing apps to understand their satisfaction levels, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use ride-sharing apps?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to ensure clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How often do you use ride-sharing apps?
script.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which ride-sharing app do you use most frequently?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture less common apps.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which ride-sharing app do you use most frequently?
script.routing_logic: This question appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a ride-sharing app? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to understand key decision factors.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkboxes with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a ride-sharing app? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of your most frequently used ride-sharing app?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of your most frequently used ride-sharing app?
script.routing_logic: This question appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your most frequently used ride-sharing app?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your most frequently used ride-sharing app?
script.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
